characters.name: Jinx
characters.description: A manic and impulsive criminal from Zaun, Jinx lives to wreak havoc without care for the consequences.
characters.background: Originally named Powder, she is Vi's younger sister who struggled with self-doubt before a tragic accident led to her transformation into Jinx.

characters.name: Vi
characters.description: A hotheaded enforcer from Zaun, Vi fights to protect her sister and her home from those who would harm them.
characters.background: A former street kid from Zaun, Vi grew up alongside her sister Powder before being imprisoned in Stillwater prison.

characters.name: Caitlyn
characters.description: The intelligent and determined sheriff of Piltover, seeking justice and truth above all else.
characters.background: Born to the wealthy Kiramman family, Caitlyn chose to become an enforcer to pursue justice on her own terms.

characters.name: Silco
characters.description: The ambitious and ruthless leader of Zaun's underground, seeking independence for his people at any cost.
characters.background: A former partner of Vander, Silco rose to power in Zaun through violence and the production of Shimmer.

characters.name: Jayce
characters.description: A brilliant inventor who discovers how to harness magic through science, revolutionizing Piltover.
characters.background: A talented scientist who partners with Viktor to develop Hextech technology, changing the future of Piltover.

characters.name: Viktor
characters.description: A brilliant scientist from Zaun who dreams of using technology to help humanity evolve beyond its limitations.
characters.background: Born in the undercity of Zaun, Viktor's determination and genius led him to Piltover's academy where he partnered with Jayce to revolutionize Hextech technology.

characters.name: Ekko
characters.description: A young genius inventor and leader of the Firelights, fighting to protect Zaun from both Piltover's oppression and Silco's influence.
characters.background: Once a child prodigy from the lanes of Zaun, Ekko grew up to become a revolutionary leader, using his inventions to defend his people.

characters.name: Vander
characters.description: Known as the Hound of the Underground, Vander is a former revolutionary who became a protector of Zaun's people.
characters.background: After leading a failed rebellion against Piltover, Vander chose peace and became a father figure to Vi and Powder, running a bar while maintaining order in the lanes.

characters.name: Mel
characters.description: A cunning politician and member of Piltover's council, using her influence to shape the city's future.
characters.background: Coming from the powerful Medarda family of Noxus, Mel navigates Piltover's political landscape while pursuing her own ambitions and vision for the city.

characters.name: Sevika
characters.description: Silco's right-hand enforcer, loyal to his vision of an independent Zaun.
characters.background: A former follower of Vander who switched allegiance to Silco, Sevika enforces his will in the lanes of Zaun with unwavering dedication.

characters.name: Heimerdinger
characters.description: A brilliant yordle scientist and founding member of the Piltover Council, known for his cautious approach to technological advancement.
characters.background: Having lived for hundreds of years, Heimerdinger helped establish Piltover's technological supremacy, though his conservative views on progress often put him at odds with younger innovators.

characters.name: Marcus
characters.description: The conflicted Sheriff of Piltover who becomes entangled in Silco's web of corruption.
characters.background: Rising through the ranks of enforcement, Marcus's compromises with Zaun's criminal elements eventually lead to his moral downfall.

characters.name: Ambessa
characters.description: The formidable matriarch of House Medarda and Mel's mother, known for her ruthless military prowess in Noxus.
characters.background: A powerful Noxian warlord who arrives in Piltover to protect her family's interests and influence the city's political landscape.

characters.name: Finn
characters.description: A ruthless Zaunite chembaron who controls a significant portion of the undercity's criminal enterprises.
characters.background: Rising to power through the shimmer trade, Finn maintains an uneasy alliance with other undercity powers while pursuing his own ambitions.

characters.name: Sky
characters.description: A dedicated research assistant at the Academy who harbors deep admiration for Viktor.
characters.background: A brilliant young scientist whose devotion to her work and Viktor ultimately leads to tragedy.

characters.name: Bolbok
characters.description: A respected professor at the Academy of Piltover, known for his skepticism of new technologies.
characters.background: An established academic who initially opposes Jayce's research but later becomes an advocate for responsible innovation.

characters.name: Grayson
characters.description: The former Sheriff of Piltover who maintained a delicate peace between the upper and lower cities.
characters.background: A principled enforcer who worked with Vander to maintain stability until her untimely death marked a turning point in Piltover-Zaun relations.

characters.name: Mylo
characters.description: A street-smart member of Vander's adopted family who often clashed with young Powder.
characters.background: One of Vi's closest friends and fellow orphan, whose skepticism of Powder's abilities would have lasting consequences.

characters.name: Claggor
characters.description: The strong, silent member of Vander's adopted family known for his protective nature.
characters.background: A loyal friend to Vi and the others, whose strength and reliability made him an essential part of their family.

characters.name: Singed
characters.description: A brilliant but amoral scientist whose experiments push the boundaries of ethics and humanity.
characters.background: Working in the shadows of Zaun, Singed's revolutionary but horrific experiments in chemical engineering would shape the future of both cities.

characters.name: Shoola
characters.description: A veteran member of the Piltover Council known for her diplomatic approach to governance.
characters.background: A seasoned politician who helps maintain balance in the Council while navigating the city's complex political landscape.

characters.name: Hoskel
characters.description: A conservative member of the Piltover Council who prioritizes tradition and stability.
characters.background: A wealthy merchant-turned-politician who represents the old guard of Piltover's elite.

characters.name: Salo
characters.description: An influential member of the Piltover Council with strong ties to the merchant clans.
characters.background: A shrewd politician who carefully weighs progress against tradition in Council decisions.

characters.name: Deckard
characters.description: A violent enforcer for Silco who becomes one of the first test subjects for Shimmer.
characters.background: A street thug whose transformation by Shimmer demonstrates the drug's horrific effects on the human body.

characters.name: Chuck
characters.description: The friendly bartender at The Last Drop who serves as Vander's loyal assistant.
characters.background: A fixture of the undercity community who helps maintain The Last Drop as a neutral ground in Zaun.

characters.name: Babette
characters.description: A young member of the Firelights who follows Ekko's leadership.
characters.background: One of the many young Zaunites who found purpose and family within the Firelights movement.

characters.name: Rio
characters.description: A mysterious creature used in Singed's experiments, symbolizing the cost of progress.
characters.background: A being whose suffering at the hands of Singed's experiments represents the dark side of scientific advancement.

characters.name: Elora
characters.description: A skilled medic working in the undercity, treating victims of violence and Shimmer addiction.
characters.background: A compassionate healer who witnesses firsthand the devastating effects of the conflict between Piltover and Zaun.

characters.name: Theo
characters.description: A progressive member of the Piltover Council who supports technological advancement.
characters.background: An advocate for change who sees Hextech as the key to Piltover's continued prosperity.

characters.name: Vern
characters.description: A chemtech engineer working in Zaun's underground laboratories.
characters.background: A brilliant but morally ambiguous scientist who contributes to the development of dangerous technologies.

characters.name: Hope
characters.description: A young refugee who finds sanctuary with the Firelights.
characters.background: A survivor of Zaun's harsh conditions who represents the potential for a better future.

characters.name: Finn's Enforcer
characters.description: A brutal enforcer working for Finn, known for maintaining order through violence.
characters.background: A feared figure in the undercity who rose through the ranks of Zaun's criminal hierarchy.

characters.name: Silco's Doctor
characters.description: A medical professional who assists Silco in his Shimmer operations.
characters.background: A qualified physician who chose to use their skills in service of Zaun's criminal enterprises.

characters.name: Marcus's Daughter
characters.description: The young daughter of Sheriff Marcus, whose existence influences his difficult choices.
characters.background: An innocent child whose future her father tries to protect through increasingly compromised means.

characters.name: Councilor Brightmoor
characters.description: An elderly member of the Piltover Council known for his conservative views.
characters.background: A long-serving councilor who represents the traditional values of Piltover's established families.

characters.name: Silco's Lieutenant
characters.description: A loyal officer in Silco's organization who helps coordinate his operations.
characters.background: A capable strategist who helps maintain Silco's control over Zaun's criminal enterprises.

characters.name: Powder's Mother
characters.description: Vi and Powder's biological mother who died during the failed rebellion against Piltover.
characters.background: A brave woman who fought alongside Vander in the uprising, her death deeply impacted her daughters' lives.

characters.name: Benzo
characters.description: A respected merchant in the lanes who works closely with Vander.
characters.background: A trusted figure in Zaun's community who helps maintain the delicate balance between the upper and lower cities.

characters.name: Silco's Chemist
characters.description: A skilled chemist working in Silco's Shimmer production facilities.
characters.background: A technical expert whose knowledge helps perfect the Shimmer formula, contributing to its widespread impact on Zaun.

characters.name: Young Viktor
characters.description: The childhood version of Viktor, showing his early struggles with disability and his determination to overcome it.
characters.background: A brilliant child from the undercity whose early experiences with illness and limitation shaped his future aspirations.
